rukus.text: avaru helidaru; ayyo nam'ma daurbhagyave! Navu khandita akramigalagiddevu
navu avarannu phasalu koyda holavagi mattu kidi arida budiya rasiyagi marpadisuva tanakavu avara i rodanavu munduvaridittu
akasavannu mattu bhumiyannu mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu navu kevala mojigagi srstisilla
ondu vele namage moju madabekiddare, (mattu) nijakku navu hage mada bayasiddare, navu adannu nam'malle madikolluttiddevu

Navu satyavannu mithyada mele appalisidaga adu (satyavu) adannu (mithyavannu) hosaki hakuttade mattu adu (mithyavu) nuccu nuragi biduttade. Nivu racisikondavugalindagi (nim'ma mithya nambikegalindagi) nimage vinasa kadide
akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva pratiyobbaru avanige seriruvaru. Innu, avana bali iruvavarantu, avanannu aradhisuva visayadalli ahankara toruvudilla mattu avaru daniyuvudu illa
avaru irulallu hagalallu avana pavitravannu japisuttiruttare mattu avaru alasya toruvudilla
avaru bhumiyinda arisi kondiruva devarugalu, (sattavarannu) matte jivantagolisaballare

ondu vele avugalalli (bhumi – akasagalalli) allahana horatu bere devarugalu iddiddare averadu astavyastavagi biduttiddavu. Visvasinhasanada odeyanada allahanu, avaru horisuva ella aropagalinda sampurna muktanu
avana yavude krtyada kuritu yaru avanannu vicarisalararu. Adare avara (itarellara) vicarane khandita nadeyuvudu

avarenu, avana (allahana) horatu itararannu devaragisikondiruvare? Heliri; nivu nim'ma puraveyannu tanniri. Idu (kur‌an) nanna bali iruva upadesavu iduve mattu nanna hindinavara bali idda upadesavu iduve. Adare avaralli heccinavaru satyavannu ballavaralla. Addarindale avaru mukha tirugisikondiddare
(dutare,) navu nimaginta munce kalisidda ella dutarigu, – nanna horatu bere devarilla. Addarinda nannannu matra aradhisiri – ennuva divyasandesavanne kalisiddevu
a parama dayamayanigobba putraniddane endu avaru heluttare. Avanu parama pavananu. Avaru (malak‌galu) avana gauravanvita dasaru
avarendu avanigeduragi matanaduvudilla mattu avanu adesisiddanne avaru maduttare
Avanantu avara mundiruva hagu hindiruva ellavannu ballanu. Avanu (allahanu) meccuvavara horatu bere yara paravagiyu avaru sipharasu madalararu. Svatah avare avana bhayadinda naduguttiruvaru
avara paiki yaradaru avana (allahana) jotege tanu devaru – endu helidare, navu atanige narakada sikseyannu niduvevu. Iduve akramigaligagi nam'malliruva pratiphala
dhikkarigalu aritillave, akasagalu mattu bhumi kudikondiddavu. Konege navu averadannu berpadisidevu. Innu pratiyondu jivanta vastuvannu navu nirininda srstisiruvevu. Avarenu nambuvudillave
bhumiyu avarondige vali bidabaradendu navu adaralli parvatagalannu ittiruvevu mattu avarige dari sigalendu navu adaralli, visalavada margagalannu ittiruvevu
innu, akasavannu navu subhadra capparavagisiruvevu. Adare avaru nam'ma ella puravegalannu kadeganisuttiddare
